search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Instamojo (instamojo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Instamojo is [https://www.instamojo.com/pricing/](https://www.instamojo.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Affordable eCommerce Website Pricing - Starts at Just ₹10/day - Instamojo

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/close6.png) ![Image 2](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/pricingpopip.png)

##### Build your dream store  
with ease!

Connect with us to guide you through the process of creating your perfect online store.

[Get in touch with us](https://instamojo.appointlet.com/s/instamojo-online-store-p?utm_source=store&utm_medium=pricing-page&utm_campaign=custom-plan)

  ![Image 3](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/close6.png) ![Image 4](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/pricingpopip.png)

##### Build a landing page  
with ease!

Connect with us to guide you through the process of creating your perfect landing page

[Get in touch with us](https://instamojo.appointlet.com/s/smart-page?utm_source=smartpages&utm_medium=pricing-page&utm_campaign=custom-plan)

  ![Image 5](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/close6.png) ![Image 6](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/pricingpopip.png)

##### Collect payments  
with ease!

Connect with us to guide you through the process of creating a payment link

[Get in touch with us](https://instamojo.appointlet.com/s/smart-links)

Your business is totally in your budget!
----------------------------------------

Run an online business at the cost of a chai ![Image 7: tea](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/chai-2.svg) and samosa!  
Premium online store plans starting at just ₹10/day.

*   [Online Store](https://www.instamojo.com/pricing/#)
*   [Smart Page](https://www.instamojo.com/pricing/#)
*   [Payment Link](https://www.instamojo.com/pricing/#)

#### Best Value

#### Chosen by 70% Businesses

### Lite

### ₹0/yr

Get a fully customisable website, perfect for businesses that are just starting out.

*   5% + ₹3 transaction fee
*   Shopping Cart
*   Unlimited Products
*   Cash on Delivery
*   Shipping Integrations
*   Order Management
*   Google Shopping Integration
*   Categories and Variants

#### Best Value

### Starter

### ₹6,999/yr

Get a professional looking website that impresses your customers.

Everything in Lite, plus

*   5% + ₹3 transaction fee
*   Custom Domain Linking
*   19+ Premium Themes
*   No Instamojo branding
*   3 Images per product
*   3 Banner images

#### Chosen by 70% Businesses

### Growth

### ₹14,999/yr

### ₹2,999/mo

Lower transaction fees and powerful features for a growing business.

Everything in Starter, plus

*   2% + ₹3 transaction fee
*   Abandoned Cart Recovery
*   Discount Coupons
*   Whatsapp Integration
*   10 images per product
*   10 Banner Images
*   SEO Options
*   Advanced Analytics
*   Benefits worth ₹2000

![Image 8](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/free-domain.svg)

**FREE domain\***  
worth up to **₹1,000**

### Do-It-For-Me

### Price on Request

We create your online store for you. All you need to do is relax.

Get 12-months support and benefits like

*   Store set-up by our team
*   Dedicated eCommerce advisor
*   Dashboard training
*   Regular catalog updates
*   Personalised feature recommendations

 ![Image 9](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/whatsapp-logo.png)

**Phone & Whatsapp**  
support for first **30 days**

![Image 10](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/free-domain.svg)

**FREE domain\***  
worth up to **₹1,000**

\* GST will be charged in addition to mentioned prices.

### BASIC

### ₹0/yr

*   Unlimited landing pages
*   Integrated Payments at 5%+₹3
*   Themes and colour customisation
*   Unlimited testimonials
*   Unlimited FAQs
*   Thank you page
*   Discount codes
*   Up to 3 pricing options
*   Profile display
*   Collect required information from customers

### PRO

### ₹12,999/yr

### ₹2,499/mo

Everything in Basic plan, plus

*   2% + ₹ 3 transaction fee
*   Custom Domain Linking
*   Enquiry Form
*   No Instamojo Branding
*   Facebook Tracking Pixel
*   Google Analytics Integration
*   Whatsapp and Calendly Add-ons
*   Webhooks
*   Custom Code and Widgets
*   Advanced Analytics

![Image 180](https://www.instamojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/free-domain.svg)

Get domains worth **₹1,000** for **FREE**

\* GST will be charged in addition to mentioned prices.

##### Money Back Guarantee

Try Instamojo Smart Pages for 14 days and if you’re not 100% satisfied, get your money back.

##### Secure Payments

PCI-DSS certified payment gateway comes integrated with smart pages at no additional charges.

PRO

Explore our Do-It-For-Me (DIFM) plans
-------------------------------------

Why pay extra for added plugins and developers? We will build your dream store for you.

*   Online store built by eCommerce experts
*   Get personalised feature recommendations
*   Grow sales with a business success manager
*   A single all-inclusive cost for the entire eCommerce set up

Frequently asked questions (FAQs)  

------------------------------------

### What are Instamojo Premium Plans?

Instamojo premium stores have many advanced eCommerce features that are not included in the Lite Plan [free online store](https://www.instamojo.com/online-store/). You can see our full list of features above to compare plans. On this #D2CTech platform, get a complete eCommerce experience – free domain, lower transaction fees, marketing tools & more.

### Do I need to know coding to build a store ?

You need no coding knowledge to [build an eCommerce store](https://www.instamojo.com/online-store/) on Instamojo. You can get started with your own online store in just a few clicks. Pick from one of the Instamojo store templates and themes to customise your store and make it look just like you want to. Getting your eCommerce store up and running has never been easier.

### Can I try Instamojo Premium Plans for free?

No. While we do not have a free trial for new users, we have a 14-day money back guarantee. That means if you purchase a premium plan & do not like our product, we will give you a 100% refund – no questions asked. However, the money-back guarantee is available only if the claim is made within 14 days of subscribing to the [premium plans.](https://www.instamojo.com/pricing/)

### Can I downgrade my Instamojo online store plan?

If you want to downgrade your plan, you can do so within 14 days of choosing a plan. You will get a full refund if you downgrade within 14 days. Please note no refund will be available after the 14th day but we can still help downgrade your plan. For any queries with your subscription plan, please write to [storesales@instamojo.com](mailto:storesales@instamojo.com).

### Can I ship my products with Instamojo?

Yes! You can ship your products with your favourite shipping partner on Instamojo. We have direct integrations with [small business shipping solutions](https://www.instamojo.com/ecommerce-shipping/) like Shiprocket, Shipway, Pickrr, Vamaship and more. You get doorstep pickup and delivery. Get orders on your Instamojo online store and ship with your choice of shipping partner.

### Can I use my existing domain with Instamojo?

Absolutely! You can link your existing domain to your Instamojo online store directly from your dashboard. Please note the ability to link a domain to your store is available only on the Instamojo premium store plans. Upgrade to one of our affordable premium store plans to link your custom domain. You can also [buy a domain for eCommerce website](https://www.instamojo.com/domains/) on Instamojo.

### What is transactional pricing for Instamojo online store?

Every time you make a sale or collect a payment with Instamojo, we charge a transaction fee that helps us bring you these services. The charges vary depending on the type of product or service you are selling in your store.If you wish to forego the charges, you can choose Instamojo [convenience fee.](https://www.instamojo.com/features/convenience-fee/)

### How do I get my free domain ?

You [get a free domain](https://www.instamojo.com/domains/) worth ₹1,000/- only if you subscribe to the Growth plan of Instamojo premium stores. Just choose your preferred domain on your Instamojo dashboard. If the value of it is under/up to ₹1,000, you get it for FREE. Domains are subject to availability.

Start your online business journey with Instamojo
-------------------------------------------------

India’s largest all-in-one #D2CTech Platform that helps every online seller start, scale and manage their business.

Upgrade to Instamojo premium online store and landing pages. Lowest eCommerce website cost in India. Integrated payments, domains, shipping, marketing tools and more. Explore our affordable online store pricing plans.
